cause.description:
Research and Awareness. Funds donated benefit the National MPS Society on behalf of the Valdez Family in Lukie's Honor and on behalf of Erica Thiel, MPS I. Rachel Longton MPS III also will be honored. Please support these under represented and under funded diseases, join our cause! Event Sept. 8th, 2007 Oshkosh, WI. visit: www.lukieslegacy.com
1. Awareness for MPS
2. Raising funds for Research
cause.mission: Raise Awareness for All MPS children and Adults living with MPS disorders, raise funds to support research for these diseases.
cause.name: Lukie's Legacy, A Walk for a Cure.
